text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe No, your ridiculous impeachment trial caused a lot of Wasted time and money that could’ve been spent on saving lives. You’re the reason everyone’s Confused state of mind during the coronavirus. Had you stop with all your BS we would’ve been on top of the coronavirus.
